text: The following is a list of seasons played by Kastrup Boldklub from the founding of the club up to the most recent season. ==Key== * P = Played * W = Games won * D = Games drawn * L = Games lost * F = Goals for * A = Goals against * Pts = Points * Position = Final position in table * Level = Level in the football league system * Avg.
